channel.title: Nokia on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Nokia on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Don't mess with the Michelin Man
item.description: Today in Tedium: The problem with giving anyone on the street the right to review a restaurant is that he or she can easily be influenced by the wider political or social climate in setting their review score. When it comes to Yelp, the way the wind blows has a ton of influence on the final rating, something Indiana’s Memories Pizza learned the hard way when they took a stance in favor of the state’s controversial religious freedom law.
